vote.title: Authorize the approval of the Rockwall Central Appraisal District’s (RCAD) proposal to complete the 2nd floor renovation containing 7,500 sq. ft. at the site of the current appraisal office located at  841 Justin Road, Rockwall, Texas, pursuant to § 6.051 of the Tex. Tax Code which requires such proposal be approved by three-fourths (3/4) of all taxing units entitled to vote on the appointment of RCAD board members which includes the City of Dallas - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for future cost)
